summary: This is my first post on my site
title: My first post

content:
Who # Hey! This is Juan, a fan of software engineering, automation and getting things done. You can check out my background in the CV page.
Some of the things I’m interested in are:
Software Development: I love coding in Go, Python and Rust (still learning), system design and building toy projects with tools like Steampipe and Streamlit. Dev/Ops: IaC (Terraform, Pulumi, Ansible), Docker, Kubernetes, Grafana, Prometheus… You know, the classic tooling. Automation: Bash. Do you need anything else? Ok, Python can be included too ðŸ˜‰. Sports: running, climbing, hiking, snowboarding… Others: productivity, guitar and Chinese. You can contact me on LinkedIn if you wanna know more.
What # In this site I’ll be uploading some blog posts and projects related to my interests not just in SE but also in other hobbies I have.
Why # I always wanted to have a place to share my findings and projects, document things that took me too much to make it work or just store my thoughts. This will also push me to do different and more visible things, which may prevent me from getting stuck.
How # This site was built using Hugo and then Blowfish theme. Make sure to check these projects if you want to build something similar.
title: About
